mapper.sql: OID,RID, POID, QID, RID, UID, SUID, Remark, UpdateDate, UpdateID, CreateDate, Status, stay1, stay2
mapper.select:
select a.OID,a.RID,b.UserName,b.Name,b.VIP,a.`Status`,a.CreateDate,c.PType, (select count(*) from Ord_PreOrder aa where aa.OID=a.OID ) as opcount , (select count(*) from Quo_Quotation bb where bb.OID=a.OID ) as quocount from Ord_Order a LEFT JOIN Sys_User b ON a.UID=b.UID LEFT JOIN req_requirement c on a.rid=c.rid where 1=1
AND a.UID = #{uid}
AND UserName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND Name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND OID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND a.`Status` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}),'%')
AND (a.SUID is null or a.SUID = #{suid})
order by a.CreateDate Desc

select a.OID,a.RID,b.UserName,b.Name,b.VIP,a.`Status`,a.CreateDate,c.PType, (select count(*) from Ord_PreOrder aa where aa.OID=a.OID ) as opcount , (select count(*) from Quo_Quotation bb where bb.OID=a.OID ) as quocount from Ord_Order a LEFT JOIN Sys_User b ON a.UID=b.UID LEFT JOIN req_requirement c on a.rid=c.rid order by a.CreateDate Desc
mapper.insert:
insert into Ord_Order
OID,
POID,
QID,
RID,
UID,
SUID,
Remark,
UpdateDate,
UpdateID,
CreateDate,
Status,
stay1,
stay2,
#{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{poid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{qid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{suid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{stay1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stay2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update Ord_Order
POID = #{poid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QID = #{qid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RID = #{rid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UID = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUID = #{suid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UpdateDate = #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UpdateID = #{updateid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CreateDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stay1 = #{stay1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stay2 = #{stay2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where OID = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update Ord_Order set POID = #{poid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QID = #{qid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RID = #{rid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UID = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUID = #{suid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UpdateDate = #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdateID = #{updateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stay1 = #{stay1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stay2 = #{stay2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where OID = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
